Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit from this unique transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
